## Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you’re proposing.

## Problem / Motivation

- What problem does this feature solve?
- Who is the target user (driver, fleet manager, administrator, researcher, etc.)?

## Proposed Solution

- Describe how the feature should work.
- Include any sketches, diagrams, or user flows if helpful.

## Alternatives Considered

- List any alternative solutions or workarounds you’ve considered.

## Additional context

Add any other context, examples, or references that might help us understand the proposal. Mention related issues if they exist.
